nodes.text: Shara-Or was a female Draethos who lived on the planet Tirahnn during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.

Shara-Or originally worked as a police officer in the capital city of Tirahnn. However, during the Clone Wars, the planet was occupied by the Confederacy of Independent Systems and Shara-Or lost her job when the building where she worked was taken over by Commander Zolghast, the leader of the Separatist forces on the world. She took a new job, working as a private security officer in a skyscraper that was owned by the Tagge Company.
